name: Avoid Universal Selectors
description: Avoid Universal Selectors because element selections that could be matched anywhere in the document can be very slow. This rule is compliant with CISQ OMG ASCPEM-PRF-04 recommendation.
output:
Line and column for each violation 
Associated value => number of violations found
rationale: Ensure that using jQuery selector request do not lead to a performance issue.
sample:
$('div.container > *'); // SLOW
or
$( ":radio" ); // Implied universal selection.
or
$( "*:radio" ); // Implied universal selection.
total: Number of JQuery artifacts (Javascript source code containing JQuery)

qualityStandards.name: Resource-consuming operation in loop
qualityStandards.description: Remove instances where an operation causing consumption of platform resource (messaging, lock, file, stream, directory, etc.) is directly or indirectly called within a loop body or within a loop condition
